name: Roadie and Kazoo
description:
Booted off the tour bus, ride or die fan Roadie finds himself in a derelict land with nothing but a questionably tuned kazoo to restore the world and create the perfect haven for him and the band to live as one. (He hopes.)

Gameplay controls are 1,2,3,4 / WASD 

Created for the Global Jame Jam 2023 

Writing by Bex Betton

Emitting Kazoo Noises by Dave 

Art by David Keenor 

UI/Interface by Eduard Proskurjakov

The Voice of Roadie by Dr Mike Reddy 

Composition / Sound Design by Alpine Escape (Dylan McCarthy)

Audio Effects

Kazoo by Saltbearer: https://freesound.org/people/Saltbearer/sounds/506308/

Roadie Thump by DigestContent: https://freesound.org/people/DigestContent/sounds/458877/

Title Splash by Jibey-: https://freesound.org/people/Jibey-/sounds/658310/
